hero.title:
Chulha Chauki Da Dhaba
Authentic Indian Flavors
hero.subtitle: Experience the warmth of our kitchen and the rich tapestry of traditional Indian cuisine.

about.title: A Taste of Home
about.paragraph1: At Chulha Chauki Da Dhaba, we bring you the heart and soul of India through our authentic dishes.  Each recipe is a journey, passed down through generations and crafted with the freshest ingredients and aromatic spices.
about.paragraph2: From the bustling streets of Delhi to the serene landscapes of Punjab, our menu captures the diverse culinary heritage of India.  Join us and rediscover the true meaning of delicious.
